jQuery(document).ready(function($){ sessionStorage.setItem('h5ab-print-article', ' Home' + " Read with Your Teachers! Click here to find videos of your favorite teachers reading, practicing math, and more!

Click Here WUSD COVID-19 School Closure Updates Click here for the latest School Closure Updates from the Washington Unified School District.

Click Here Social-Emotional Resources for Families Click here for social-emotional resources available to families in Fresno County.

Click Here Downloadable Educational Resources Click here to download paper and pencil lessons and activities for students. 

Click Here T.V. Educational Resources Click here to find televised educational options and activities for students.

West Fresno Middle School Educational Learning Packets for Weeks 4 & 5_April 21st West Fresno Elementary School Educational Learning Packets for Weeks 4 & 5_April 21st American Union Elementary School Educational Learning Packets for Weeks 4 & 5_April 21st Washington Union High School Educational Learning Packets for Week 4_April 21st The Grapevine E-Newsletter  The Grapevine, Print Edition  English   /    Spanish

" + ''); $.strRemove = function(theTarget, theString) { return $(" ").append( $(theTarget, theString).remove().end() ).html(); }; var articleStr = sessionStorage.getItem('h5ab-print-article'); var removeArr = ['video','audio','script','iframe']; $.each(removeArr, function(index, value){ var processedCode = $.strRemove(value, articleStr); articleStr = processedCode; }); var fullPrintContent = articleStr; sessionStorage.setItem('h5ab-print-article', fullPrintContent); });
